Package org.forgerock.openidm.quartz.impl

Class TriggerWrapper

java.lang.Object
org.forgerock.openidm.quartz.impl.TriggerWrapper
public class TriggerWrapper extends Object
A wrapper that contains all necessary information for a Trigger.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    TriggerWrapper(String name, String group, String serializedValue, boolean paused)
    Create a new TriggerWrapper from parameters.
    TriggerWrapper(String name, String group, String serializedValue, boolean paused, boolean acquired, String nodeId)

    TriggerWrapper(org.forgerock.json.JsonValue map)
    Create a new TriggerWrapper from a repo Map object.
    TriggerWrapper(org.forgerock.json.JsonValue value, boolean paused)
    Create a new TriggerWrapper from a JsonValue object representing the trigger.
    TriggerWrapper(org.quartz.Trigger trigger, boolean paused)
    Create a new TriggerWrapper from the specified trigger and specifying the trigger pause state.
    TriggerWrapper(org.quartz.Trigger trigger, boolean paused, boolean acquired)
    Create a new TriggerWrapper from the specified trigger and specifying the pause and acquired state.
    TriggerWrapper(org.quartz.Trigger trigger, boolean paused, boolean acquired, String nodeId)
    Create a new TriggerWrapper from the specified trigger and specifying the pause state, aquired state, and the nodeId.

  • Constructor Details

    • TriggerWrapper

      public TriggerWrapper(org.quartz.Trigger trigger, boolean paused) throws org.quartz.JobPersistenceException
      Create a new TriggerWrapper from the specified trigger and specifying the trigger pause state.
      Parameters:
      trigger - the Trigger object
      paused - if the trigger is paused
      Throws:
      org.quartz.JobPersistenceException - if unable to serialize trigger

    • TriggerWrapper

      public TriggerWrapper(org.quartz.Trigger trigger, boolean paused, boolean acquired) throws org.quartz.JobPersistenceException
      Create a new TriggerWrapper from the specified trigger and specifying the pause and acquired state.
      Parameters:
      trigger - the Trigger object
      paused - if the trigger is paused
      acquired - if the trigger is acquired
      Throws:
      org.quartz.JobPersistenceException - if unable to serialize trigger

    • TriggerWrapper

      public TriggerWrapper(org.quartz.Trigger trigger, boolean paused, boolean acquired, String nodeId) throws org.quartz.JobPersistenceException
      Create a new TriggerWrapper from the specified trigger and specifying the pause state, aquired state, and the nodeId.
      Parameters:
      trigger - the Trigger object
      paused - if the trigger is paused
      acquired - if the trigger is paused
      nodeId - the nodeId that acquired the trigger
      Throws:
      org.quartz.JobPersistenceException - if unable to serialize trigger

      public TriggerWrapper(String name, String group, String serializedValue, boolean paused)
      Create a new TriggerWrapper from parameters.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the trigger
      group - the trigger group
      serializedValue - a string representing the serialized trigger
      paused - if the trigger is paused
